title: 10 year mystery gift - How do I open it / what did I get
body:
I got the mystery gift for the 10 years of LoL (since I already own Riot Kayle) which is amazing to me since I started playing in Beta and have played regularly since except for a when I was working in an area with no internet, let alone game quality internet.  However, I just got the pop up on my screen with no opening animation or information on what was inside and I can't find anywhere in my summoner profile or hextech crafting area that shows a mystery box to open.  Where would I find that to open if I still need to and if it automatically opened could you check my account and let me know what I got since I've got sooooo many skins I'd never find it just by digging through.

Regards,
Dreampod

replies.body: When I opened mine, it just gave me the icon and didn't give me a mystery skin because I already own Riot Kayle.
Same here i did only get the summoner icon even tho i already have riot kayle and kayle i did only get a pop up for the icon nothing more... i wonder if iam going to get the skin...
This also just happened to me. What do I do?

I already had Kayle and Riot Kayle. I got the animation for the Icon, but when i check my purchase history all i see is the Icon but i don't see a mystery gift skin or anything. I just wan't to know what skin I got or if i even got a skin at all.

I'm not sure if this s/s will work but:
http://imgur.com/5WePdOc
Same here, don't know what I got, haha

Maybe I missed something as well. I received the summoner icon (thanks!). I also already have the Riot Kayle skin and it referenced something about a mystery gift if you already had that skin. Basically mirroring the OP's statements and questions I was unable to find anything to open or pointing the way to said mystery gift. If anyone can shed light on the subject or if I missed something,  that would be much appreciated.

-Fundeth

From what I've heard, the animation is for the Summoner Icon, but you can check your gift history from the Account button in the store, then click *purchase history*, then **Gifting History**. These are going out in batches to ensure it gets to everyone properly since we're gifting millions of players this content. If you didn't get the rest of the gifts yet, sit tight while we get them out and if you have any reason to believe that you haven't been gifted the content by 9/23, let me know.

Let me know if you have any questions.
thanks for the information
Hi, I go the summoner icon, but no mystery gift. Unlike people above, who just had no opening animation, I didn't get the item at all. Should I keep waiting?
Yes, sit tight until the 23rd. Any issues with this that aren't resolved by then can be looked into with a [support ticket.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)
Yeah, at that point you just aren't a part of the latest shipment. No worries

A lot of my friends are getting mystery gifts after they had gotten riot Kayle, even my smurf got one and it's only level 17, but my main account didn't receive the icon nor a mystery gift later, I got riot kayle but it didn't inform me.

Just to clarify, you'll only receive a mystery gift if you already own **both** Kayle and Riot Kyle prior to the gifts rolling out.

We've pushed the deadline to the 30th while we're still getting content sent out. Let me know if you have any other questions.
I still am NOT showing anything for my mystery gift! :(
i still havent got it xD I Contacted support aswell
thanks for the info same happened to me i guess ill wait

I already received the icon and I decided to look through all the champions I own to see if I got a skin and I have not acquired any additional skins. So my guess is that they will send out the mystery gifts after they finish one of the passes.
Same. it just gave me the icon
I have the same problem... I got the summoner icon of the poro with a birthday hat, and that's good. Since I already have riot Kyle I was expecting a mistery gift... anything has arrived so far ðŸ˜ª

I didnt got my gifts and its 23rd of september or will I get my mystery gift on the weekend btw its my birthday and I thought that riot is gonna give me my gift for my B-Day and I pulled Riot Kayle from a box and I bought it with essence
Same Here !! What should i do ??? i want my mystery skin Ã§_Ã§
i didnt even get one yet

Guys , i didnt get either the icon or the skin.. nothing at all.no pop up or notifications. i have been playing all this week.so im **active**. But no sign of  gifts.. Or RIOT make me an exception  o_0?

I didn't have Riot Kayle and got it, but I also got a mystery gift, and I have the same problem. It says its from riot, and idk what I got inside it or why I got it in the first place. But happy 10th anyway Riot :D
I'm having the same problem as those above. I will wait until 9/23 for any updates to the issue.
Same here.. i hope, that we'll get at least something :/
I got a "mystery gift" but all it contained was the summoner icon. Guess we should just wait until whatever date Riot said everything should be handed out by
